author: Th3_3m3rald_M1n3cart
title: The best LEGO set ever.
review: Truly the greatest LEGO set of its time. Its use of newer plates with hinges was super ahead of its time for 2002. The way it made use of 1x2 transparent yellow plates to make the lights really pop is truly genius. And the 2x4 plate used at the base for extra stability is truly genius. Nothing, not even a raging soccer player, can knock this over now. An excellent set that will truly be at the top of every kids' Christmas list this year.
